Address.label: Address
Address.value: 350 POPLAR CHURCH ROAD TWO LOGAN SQUARE, 17TH FLOOR, CAMP HILL, Pennsylvania, 17011, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Harsco provides industrial mill services to steel and nonferrous metal producers in more than 30 countries, including the United States. It also supplies gas-control and gas-containment products internationally, scaffolding services to the industrial maintenance and construction markets, and railway maintenance-of-way equipment and services. Harsco's other businesses include providing process equipment, industrial grating, and slag abrasives.
